::: {.btn-group role="group" aria-label="About"} :::
Hi, my name is Bruno Mioto, I'm a biologist, currently doing my PhD in Ecology of Inland Water Ecosystems ([PEA-UEM](https://en.pea.uem.br/)) and I study **fish phylogeography**! I have experience with data analysis and chart creation, I love to create new **R packages** and work as a **data visualization freelancer**! See my freelance profile here: **[Upwork](https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/~01b609b6016a32f6c6)** And my portfolio here: **[Behance](https://www.behance.net/gallery/136021485/Data-Visualization-Portfolio)** I always seek to bring the right information in a simpler way to society. [Graduate Program in Ecology of Inland Water Ecosystems (PEA-UEM)](https://en.pea.uem.br/) | Maringá - PR PhD | 2021 - Present Graduate Program in Ecology of Inland Water Ecosystems (PEA-UEM) | Maringá - PR Master's Program | 2019 - 2021 State University of Maringá (UEM) | Maringá - PR Undergraduate | 2015 - 2019 ## Experience [Galápagos](https://www.brgalapagos.com/) - Charts and Maps Director of Graphics | 2022 - Present [Upwork](https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/~01b609b6016a32f6c6) Top Rated Freelancer | 2022 - Present Renovação Preparatory School Volunteer Teacher - Biology | 2019 - Present
